name: glass-keep
description: React Glass Keep is a personal notes app inspired by Google Keep with a glassmorphism UI. It runs as a self-hosted web app where users can create, edit, and manage sticky notes and simple lists with full local data ownership.

features.title: List Management
features.description: Organize tasks and items with checkbox lists for to-do tracking

features.title: Local Data Storage
features.description: All notes stored locally on your server with full data ownership

features.title: Drag And Drop
features.description: Rearrange notes with intuitive drag-and-drop interface

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Quickly find notes by searching through titles and content

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Seamless experience across desktop and mobile devices
